subjects.name: Digital Logic
subjects.topics: Boolean algebra, combinational and sequential circuits.

subjects.name: Programming and Data Structures
subjects.topics: Programming in C; Arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees.

subjects.name: Theory of Computation
subjects.topics: Regular expressions, finite automata, context-free grammars.

subjects.name: Operating Systems
subjects.topics: Processes, threads, memory management, file systems.

subjects.name: Computer Networks
subjects.topics: OSI and TCP/IP layers, routing, flow control.
